frontmatter.title: Welp
frontmatter.subtitle: Component Design Within a Microservices Architecture
frontmatter.excerpt: Built with React. Local restaurant reviews and information, modeled after Yelp. Components that display restaurant information, hours, and menu items. Implements a RESTful API on the backend.

node.excerpt:
On a recent project, I led the optimization and development of the backend architecture for a crowfunding application.
The two main goals of…

frontmatter.title: Jumpstarter
frontmatter.subtitle: Optimizing Backend Architecture for Scale
frontmatter.excerpt: Crowdfunding platform modeled after Kickstarter. Designed for scale, handling 7K requests/second. Utilizes server-side rendering and other techniques to achieve 2x page loads speeds.

node.excerpt: Predicts events of interest based on user inputted star ratings by building a simple neural network in the browser. Recommendation engine…

frontmatter.title: Eventright
frontmatter.subtitle: Personalized Live Event Recommendations
frontmatter.excerpt: Predicts events of interest based on user inputted star ratings by building a simple neural network in the browser. Recommendation engine built with Brain.js.  View is rendered as a single page app with map and event list components.

node.excerpt: For this project we analyzed data from the World Bank logistics performance index. The primary questions we wanted to answer were: What’s a…

frontmatter.title: Visualizing World Bank Logistics Data
frontmatter.excerpt: A team of us worked together to build a visualization using D3.js to understand trade logistics around the world. We created a choropleth map, radar charts, and a vertical bar chart filterable using dropdowns and sliders.
